1.

```{r}
b1 <- 2.35
s_sq <- 2.5
alpha <- 0.05
n <- 50
p <- 2
ss_xx <- 2300
s_b1 <- round(sqrt(s_sq / ss_xx), 4)
t_crit <- round(qt(1 - alpha / 2, n - p), 4)
round(
  b1 - t_crit * s_b1, 2
)
round(
  b1 + t_crit * s_b1, 2
)
```

7.

```{r}
s <- 1.2
xbar <- 14
ss_xx <- 34
x_h <- 12
n <- 20
p <- 2
alpha <- 0.05
t_crit <- round(qt(1 - alpha / 2, n - p), 4)
s_pred <- round(sqrt(s^2 * (1 + 1 / n + ((x_h - xbar)^2 / ss_xx))), 4)
round(t_crit * s_pred, 2)
```
